body: Secret Vatican Archives?? I don't know what the hell are you talking about!

Machida hiraku is basically Michael Haneke if he was creating loli doujin works instead of directing films. Mad respect for Megafagget to translate machida works and many other left untouched to come.




(Fun fact : The artist had a dream becoming film director)
I really like this type of Doujins

Vatican priest burns the "evidence" of the church's crimes against children, creating a narrative in which the children enjoy what's being done to them instead of detesting it like the artist originally meant to depict. Imagination replaces reality, but is imagination better than reality if these are the consequences?
Masturbathing or something I don't know I'm not an artist
This is deep... It's that or my mind is just fcking shallow...
